CustomField.description: If selected, the object sharing model applied to the Project and Opportunity objects in your org is used to control the data displayed to users in the Backlog, Billing, and Project Reporting datasets.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If selected, the object sharing model applied to the Project and Opportunity objects in your org is used to control the data displayed to users in the Backlog, Billing, and Project Reporting datasets.
CustomField.label: Object Sharing
